participant_1.name: Emily Thompson
participant_1.background: i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i'm pregnant with my first child. i read a book every week. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.

participant_2.name: Michael Johnson
participant_2.background: i'm a male. i have children and dogs. i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years.

content.text: Good morning, sir. How was your Thanksgiving?
